content: {"name": "St. Isidore Catholic Church, forgotten harvest mobile pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Forgotten harvest has food distribution every 2nd and 4th Wednesday of the month. \nPeople can get food from Parish office as well, call the office number between 8:30 am - 4pm to inquire. (Only for people living in Church boundaries)", "email": "", "url": "https://www.forgottenharvest.org/find-food/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "18201 23 Mile Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Macomb", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48042", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.671848, "longitude": -82.9435517}, "phones": [{"number": "(586) 286-1700", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Open to all"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
